task.title: Post a Review
task.shortdesc: Any user who is logged in to your site's authentication system can post a review using this process.

context.p: Users can post up to one Review into each Reviews Collection. Only users who are logged in can post a review.

step.cmd: Click Write review. The Review editor will be displayed.

Enter the Review Body (approximately 8000 characters). As you click into the Review Body field, all available features will appear at the bottom of the editor, for example rich text formatting, friend mentions, social sharing and posting your review.
Select a Rating by clicking on the stars above the review edit area.
Click Post review to post your review into the Collection, and display it at the top of the stream.
